EmailTemplate.name: 2023 - Classrooms - CC01416
EmailTemplate.subject: Modular Classroom for {!Account.Name} - quick delivery
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi! Do you need classroom space for the 2023/2024 school year? We have a large 7,000 sq. ft. temporary modular 6 classroom building ready to go.
If you have interest in renting this building, please connect with us as soon as possible so we can reserve it for you.
- 6 spacious classrooms - 2 private offices - 3 restrooms - Faculty break room - Storage room - Water fountains - Central corridor - Recessed double door entry - 110' x 64' - 7,000 sq. ft.
If you need a different size classroom building or an office building, we are here to help.
Classroom Buildings https://www.boxxmodular.com/classrooms/
Office Buildings https://www.boxxmodular.com/classrooms/
To connect with us for more information:
> Reply to this email
> Request a quote on our website - https://www.boxxmodular.com/quote-request/
> Call 877-966-7839 to speak with one of our local experts
We are here to help!
